screenshot.alt: Screenshot of a .brushvariant file in Corel Painter 2023
screenshot.caption: BRUSHVARIANT file open in Corel Painter 2023

description: Paint includes various tools for creating artwork, including effects and brushes. A brush variant determines the brush's appearance making it more opaque, larger in size, etc.
You can export a BRUSHVARIANT file by selecting Brushes → Export → Brush . Then, you can name the file, choose the save location, and click Save .

images.caption: BRUSHVARIANT file open in Corel Painter 2023
